Shock waves in conservation laws and reaction-diffusion equations

Join the course group in Telegram: link
Classes:
  • March - June 2023. Tuesday, 1pm - 3pm and Friday, 9am - 11am
  • Room 866, Department of Mathematics, Edifício Leme, PUC-Rio
Material:
  • All materials in one file
  • My notes (mainly handwritten): introduction - what this course is about? (Lecture 1), notes on wave equation (Lectures 2–4), notes on conservation laws (Lectures 5–14), notes on reaction-diffusion equations (Lectures 15–24).
  • Books:
    • J. Smoller ‘‘Shock waves and reaction-diffusion equations’’, PDF
    • C. Dafermos ‘‘Hyberbolic conservation laws in continuum physics’’, PDF
    • L.C. Evans ‘‘Partial differential equations’’, PDE
    • A. Bressan ‘‘Hyperbolic Conservation Laws: An Illustrated Tutorial’’, PDF
    • H. Holden, N.H. Risebro ‘‘Front tracking for hyperbolic conservation laws’’, PDF
  • Video lectures on Youtube closely related to the course:
    • Constantine Dafermos, course of 9 lectures at IMPA: Hyberbolic conservation laws
    • Henri Berestycki, mini course of 4 lectures at IMPA: Reaction-diffusion propagation in non-homogenous media
Exercises:
  • Problem-solving sessions: Session 1, Session 2, Session 3, Session 4.
